price: ሁከት እስከማይገኝና ሃይማኖት ለአላህ ብቻ እስከሚኾን ድረስ ተጋደሉዋቸው፡፡ ቢከለክሉም ወሰንን ማለፍ፤ በበዳዮች ላይ እንጂ የለም (ወሰን አትለፉባቸው)፡፡
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ لِلَّهِۖ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fit'natun wayakūna al-dīnu lillahi fa-ini intahaw falā ʿud'wāna illā ʿalā al-ẓālimīna
